title: Add Product Listing
description: As a farmer, I want to add new products to my listing so that consumers can discover and purchase my farm products.
business_value: Core functionality enabling farmers to showcase their products, directly driving marketplace revenue.

acceptance_criteria.description: Farmer can access product management dashboard
acceptance_criteria.then: Product management dashboard is displayed with 'Add Product' button

acceptance_criteria.description: Farmer can add product with required details
acceptance_criteria.given: Farmer is on add product form
acceptance_criteria.when: Farmer enters product name, category, description, price, and quantity
Farmer selects seasonal availability (Spring, Summer, Fall, Winter, Year-round)
acceptance_criteria.then: Seasonality is saved and displayed on product

acceptance_criteria.description: Farmer can upload multiple product images
acceptance_criteria.then: All images are saved and displayed in product gallery

acceptance_criteria.given: Farmer is on add product form
acceptance_criteria.when: Farmer attempts to save without required fields
acceptance_criteria.then: Validation errors are displayed for missing fields

acceptance_criteria.description: Product appears in farmer's product list after creation
acceptance_criteria.then: New product is displayed in the list

technical_notes: Implement form validation on both frontend and backend
Support image formats: JPG, PNG, WebP
Product categories should be predefined (Vegetables, Fruits, Dairy, Meat, etc.)

product.name: string (required, max 100 chars)
product.category: enum (Vegetables, Fruits, Dairy, Meat, Eggs, Honey, Herbs, Grains, Other)
product.seasonality: array of enum (Spring, Summer, Fall, Winter, Year-round)

api_endpoints.description: Get all products for logged-in farmer

test_cases.title: Farmer successfully adds a product
preconditions: Farmer is logged in with complete profile
steps: Enter description: 'Fresh organic tomatoes grown without pesticides'
test_cases.expected_result: Product is created, confirmation shown, product appears in list

test_cases.title: Product creation fails without required fields
test_cases.expected_result: Validation error 'Product name is required' is displayed

test_cases.title: Product creation fails with invalid price
test_cases.expected_result: Validation error 'Price must be greater than 0' is displayed

test_cases.title: Multiple images can be uploaded
test_cases.expected_result: All 5 images are saved and displayed

test_cases.title: Image upload fails with invalid file type
steps: Attempt to upload a PDF file
test_cases.expected_result: Error message about invalid file type is displayed

test_cases.title: Product appears in farmer's list after creation
test_cases.expected_result: Newly created product is visible in the list

test_cases.title: Product name at maximum length
steps: Enter product name with exactly 100 characters
